description: Inspired by our piece on designers and the female artists they admire, the floral artist creates designs exclusively for T.
title: Joshua Werber’s Floral Headpieces for Artists
title_page: Joshua Werber’s Floral Headpieces for Artists - The New York Times
text:
Inspired by Simone Rocha’s design for Louise Bourgeois
“The cloud of baby’s breath enwraps the face and references a sleeping cap,” says Werber. “Like the motif in Rocha’s design, the amaryllis petals were cut to mimic the shapes in Bourgeois’ ‘Lullaby’ (2006).”
